abstract: Stocks surged higher for a second day as oil prices continued to plunge and Wall Street embraced an encouraging earnings report from JPMorgan Chase.
snippet: Stocks surged higher for a second day as oil prices continued to plunge and Wall Street embraced an encouraging earnings report from JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: Stocks surged higher for a second day on Thursday as oil prices continued to plunge and Wall Street embraced an encouraging earnings report from a banking stalwart, JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Bank Report and Oil’s Fall Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Oil’s Fall and Bank Report Lift Shares for Second Day

abstract: JPMorgan Chase said credit card and home loan losses spread to borrowers with the strongest credit histories.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase said credit card and home loan losses spread to borrowers with the strongest credit histories.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said Thursday that its second-quarter income dropped 53 percent, as credit card and home loan losses spread to borrowers with the strongest credit histories.

headline.main: Morgan Reports a Drop of 53% in Quarterly Net
headline.print_headline: Morgan Reports a Drop Of 53% in Quarterly Net
